name: Prophecy of Chiro
description:
This game was created for the Weekly GameJam #154 with the theme of 'Rock Paper Scissors'

There once was a valley, where the three villages of Rock, Paper, and Scissors lived happily. Until one day an all out war broke out for complete control.

The war has waged on for several years and has brought pain and suffering to all 3 villages. Now, a young paperling travels to escape the war when he discovers a prophecy to bring forth the peace.

He must now search for the three relics of the valley and forge them together to summon the great Chiro. However, his adventure will not be an easy one...

Includes:

- 3 Puzzles

- Narrated Story

- Custom Soundtrack

- Much More!
